description:
Olivia is a single-person desk designed for ease of assembly / disassembly.
Crafted initially as a personal work desk for urban researcher
[Olivia Tusinski][], the design was fast tracked onto OpenDesk once a
single-person desk became one of the most requested products after launch.

It's made up of just four separate components (with legs formed of twin
laminated ply sheets, a total of 10 milled parts). The desk fits onto
half a sheet of plywood, can be assembled in a matter of seconds and comes
apart for easy flat storage.

It's an ideal piece to fit into a study or living space for a freelancer
or home worker, or as a private, standalone desk in a work space or office.

[Olivia Tusinski]: https://twitter.com/OliviaJTusinski
name: Olivia Desk
